channel.title: BeotsMusic's Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 0.8
item.description:
0.8 (Feburary 17, 2015)

  • AppleScript support!
  • Skip button on a notification won't activate the application anymore.
  • Fixed space bar events to work expectedly on other windows.
  • Fixed the bug that prompted the error dialog on pressing media keys if no track is being played.

0.7 (Feburary 5, 2015)

  • Support for non-Apple keyboards.
  • Play or pause on space bar.

0.6 (January 31, 2015)

  • Fixed the bug that stopped the music when the window is closed.
  • Fixed the bug that prompted the error dialog if the account is not subscribed.

0.5 (January 30, 2015)

  • No more Flash! Tracks will play even though Flash plugin is not installed on your Mac.

0.4 (January 6, 2015)

  • Fixed a bug that prevented Twitter users from logging in.

0.3 (December 25, 2014)

  • No more login! Stay signed in (for up to 24 hours.)
  • iTunes-like notification with skip button!
  • Fixed Add to My Library functionality.
  • Account settings like signup, password recovery are now done in an external browser.
  • Minor bug fixes.

0.2 (June 6, 2014)

  • Headphones remote (Apple Mikey) support!
  • Fixed a bug that triggered play after going to sleep and wake.
  • Fixed a bug that prevented Twitter users from logging in.
  • Minor bug fixes.
